title: Container Furniture Direct S5457 Mid Century Modern Velvet Upholstered Tufted Living Room Sofa, 69.68", Grey
features: Give Your Place a Luxurious Look with the Midcentury Modern Sofa by Container Furniture Direct, Presenting a Sophisticated Design and Fabulous Velvet Upholstery in a Gorgeous Grey Color.
Sofa Measures 69.6" inches L x 33" inches W x 31.6" inches H and Weighs 82.2 lbs. Requires Home Assembly. Includes One Sofa Only.
Beautiful Midcentury Design with Tufted Seat and Finished Wood Legs. Features Luxuriously Plush Velvet Fabric Upholstery and Two Throw Pillows.
description: Have a gorgeous looking space with the Container Furniture Direct Mid Century Modern Sofa. The sofa measures 69.6 inches L x 33 inches W x 31.6 inches H and weighs 82.2 lbs. Includes one sofa only. Requires home assembly. This sofa will give your space a new luxurious look with its Midcentury look with tufted seats and finished wood legs. Features soft and plus velvet upholstery and generous foam padding for fabulous comfort and gorgeous look. Perfect for your home. Container Furniture Direct is among the leading importers in the home furnishing industry. We have grown rapidly from having only a handful of selections to hundreds of collections to accommodate the needs of today's families. We pride ourselves by offering customers the latest fashionable furniture styles and designs.
